name: Kamil Jalilov
description:
'''Kamil Jalil oğlu Jalilov''' ({{langx|az|Kamil Cəlil oglu Cəlilov}}; 29 January 1938 – 22 February 2022) was an Azerbaijani musician known for his master expertise playing wind instruments and national [[folk instruments]].

He was the master player of wind instruments such as [[oboe]] and Azerbaijani regional folk instruments.
